Title: Careers at arXiv - arXiv info
Description: arXiv is part of Cornell Tech, the graduate campus and research center of Cornell University. All arXiv employees are Cornell University employees.

Title: Understanding Microservices: Core Concepts and Benefits
Description: What are microservices, and why might they be the right architectural choice for your organization? Microservices offer independently deployable, domain-focused components that provide flexibility when applied correctly to solve the right organizational problems.
